contest-event.event-date:
July 7, 1894 D Belle Vue July Contest
Belle Vue July Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Belle Vue July Contest belle-vue-july-contest
Don Sebastiano [arr. Godfrey]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes: 1. £20 and silver medale and "Victory" euphonium value £20, and "Jubilee" cornet value £21 guineas. 2. £12, silver medal and trombone value 10 guineas. 3. £8, silver medal and "Virtuoso" trombone value 7 guineas. 4. £6 and silver medal. 5. £4 and silver medal. 41 bands entered, fisrt 20 to apply allowed to compete.
April 17, 2011, 6:39 p.m. Nov. 26, 2019, 2:30 p.m.
1 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Alexander Owen
2 South Derwent John Gladney Jnr
3 Mossley Band Edwin Swift
4 Kettering Rifles Alexander Owen
5 Dannemora Steelworks John Gladney Jnr
